name: Hero Odyssey
description:
Come and try the super fun Hero Odyssey that combines both idle gameplay and tap functions, a genuinely interesting innovation in idle mode! Defeat legions of monsters with just one finger!

Collect and train your ultimate team from 200+ idle heroes with specific and unique skills and try different combination of heroes from six factions! Once you log in this game, a familiar will join you to fight and stand alongside you forever!

Game features
1. Idle Gameplay
2. Familiars’ attack
3.Five Hero Roles
4.Six Factions
5.Earn and Receive

There are a ton of gameplay systems to construct strategies around. With battlegrounds galore and dungeons aplenty, Mirage, arena, guild, build up your team of heroes to take on numerous challenges that provide bountiful rewards!
